T02D1736:102b-1: t'a ra de ba panytsa s'a dha nam /
T02D1736:102b-3: sgrol ma lha lnga'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1736:102b-4: thugs rje che ldan ma yi dpal ldan ye shes ma //
T02D1736:103a-0: @103a * // gsal ba'i thugs rje 'gro la ston //
T02D1736:103a-1: bdud bzhi tshar gcod ston pa'i mchog / lha mo brtse ldan ma la nyer btud de //
T02D1736:103a-2: 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1736:103a-3: de yi sgrub thabs cho ga bshad //
T02D1736:103a-4: bas mtha' shing gcig lha yi gnas //
T02D1736:103a-5: dur khrod dben pa bkra shis pa //
T02D1736:103a-6: dad ldan dbang thob dam tshig ldan //
T02D1736:103a-7: gsang thub gus la shes rab che //
T02D1736:103a-8: dpa' la brtson 'grus blo ldan pas //
T02D1736:103a-9: mandala mchod pa bdud rtsir ldan //
T02D1736:103a-10: rten dang mchod pa'i yan lag bcas //
T02D1736:103a-11: lha gsal spyan drangs phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1736:103a-12: mchod pa bdun po tshad med gsal //
T02D1736:103a-13: 'od spro bsdu dang stong par gsal /
T02D1736:103a-14: aom ma h'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konyaham /
T02D1736:103a-15: de las t'am gi sa bon las //
T02D1736:103a-16: yam dang bam gyis rlung dang chu //
T02D1736:103a-17: lam dang ram gyis sa dang me //
T02D1736:103a-18: de steng bhr'um las gzhal yas khang //
T02D1736:103a-19: gru bzhi rta babs bzhi dang ldan //
T02D1736:103a-20: mu khyud lte ba rtsibs bzhir ldan //
T02D1736:103a-21: gru chad sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan //
T02D1736:103a-22: dbus su padma dur khrod gdan //
T02D1736:103a-23: rtsibs la dur khrod padmas mdzes //
T02D1736:103a-24: de steng t'am zhu h'um du gsal //
T02D1736:103a-25: de la thod pa h'um gis mdzes //
T02D1736:103a-26: spro bsdu sbyor bas sku bskyed do //
T02D1736:103a-27: mthing nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma //
T02D1736:103a-28: spyan gsum rngam pa'i nga ro can //
T02D1736:103a-29: sprul dang stag lpags rus pas brgyan //
T02D1736:103a-30: ral gri rus phreng gri gug bsnams //
T02D1736:103a-32: thod phreng bong thung 'gying ba can //
T02D1736:103a-33: nu 'phyang bcu drug lo ltar mdzes //
T02D1736:103a-34: me ri phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan //
T02D1736:103a-35: dbu skra dud kha thod pas brgyan //
T02D1736:103a-36: shin tu gsal bar mdangs ldan bskyed //
T02D1736:103a-37: de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las //
T02D1736:103a-38: shar gyi rtsibs la aom 'phros pas //
T02D1736:103a-39: dkar po 'od ldan gsal bar bsam //
T02D1736:103a-40: zhu bas rdo rje sgrol ma bskyed //
T02D1736:103a-41: mdog dkar zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
T02D1736:103a-42: rus pa'i rgyan dang sprul gyis brgyan //
T02D1736:103a-43: stag lpags thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D1736:103a-44: phyag g-yas rdo rje g-yon pa ni //
T02D1736:103a-46: lho phyogs rtsibs la hr'i: 'phros pas //
T02D1736:103a-47: ser po 'od ldan zhu ba yis //
T02D1736:103a-48: rin chen sgrol ma gser mdog la //
T02D1736:103a-49: rgyan ldan phyag g-yas rin po che //
T02D1736:103a-51: brkyang bskum khro mo'i cha lugs la //
T02D1736:103a-52: dgyes pa'i gar dang ldan pa bskyed //
T02D1736:103a-53: nub phyogs rtsibs la trim 'phros pas //
T02D1736:103a-54: padma'i sgrol ma thugs rje can //
T02D1736:103a-55: mdog dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
T02D1736:103b-0: g-yon pa autpala rang rtags @103b te ;
T02D1736:103b-1: / rgyan ldan gong dang mthun par bskyed //
T02D1736:103b-2: byang phyogs rtsibs la phat 'phros pas //
T02D1736:103b-3: las kyi sgrol ma sna tshogs mdog / phyag g-yas ral gri 'bar ba ste //
T02D1736:103b-4: g-yon pa autpala rang rtags te //
T02D1736:103b-5: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1736:103b-6: bskyed la ye shes spyan drangs la //
T02D1736:103b-7: mchod bstod byas la gnyis med bstim ;
T02D1736:103b-8: / byin brlabs dbang bskur rdzogs byas la //
T02D1736:103b-9: mi gsal bar du gsal bar bsgom //
T02D1736:103b-11: snying ga'i dkyil du yig 'bru lnga //
T02D1736:103b-12: kha dog lnga ru gsal byas la //
T02D1736:103b-13: lnga las 'od lnga spro byas la //
T02D1736:103b-14: lnga sbyangs tshur 'dus lnga ru gsal //
T02D1736:103b-15: rab 'bring tha ma gsum dang drug / bcu gnyis bar du 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D1736:103b-16: thabs dang shes rab gsal bar bsgom //
T02D1736:103b-17: bzhi po sreg gso bde ba rgyas //
T02D1736:103b-18: rdo rje nor bu'i rtse la drang //
T02D1736:103b-19: bsgyil zhing bde ba nyid la blta //
T02D1736:103b-20: mtshan ldan snod du bzang pos dgang //
T02D1736:103b-21: lnga las 'od 'phros 'dod lnga dgug / gnyis med bstims la longs spyod bya //
T02D1736:103b-22: mi rgod sa dang ske tshe dang ;
T02D1736:103b-23: / sngags dang ting 'dzin bcas pas bcing //
T02D1736:103b-24: aom aa mu ki pra sh'a ma n'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02D1736:103b-26: rgyas pa ser po bsod nams rgyas //
T02D1736:103b-27: mi rmongs dbang du dmar pos bsdus //
T02D1736:103b-28: mngon spyod nag po'i las kyis gsad //
T02D1736:103b-30: nyi shu bar du bsgrub par bya //
T02D1736:103b-31: dkar gsum chu gtsang skyur rtsis dgang //
T02D1736:103b-32: sngags bzlas tho rangs dus nyid du //
T02D1736:103b-33: gsol btab de dus bza' bar bya //
T02D1736:103b-34: aom pradzny'a pa ra t'a ra sa ta mum phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1736:103b-36: brtson 'grus ldan pas sbyar bar bya //
T02D1736:103b-37: lha nye 'dod pa'i sbyor ba yi //
T02D1736:103b-38: thang ka lugs sku ras ris la //
T02D1736:103b-39: rab gnas byas la lhar bskyed la //
T02D1736:103b-40: ye shes bstims la mchod bstod bya //
T02D1736:103b-41: bdag nyid tha mal nyid du ste //
T02D1736:103b-42: bzlas pa bri bya gsol btab 'grub //
T02D1736:103b-43: aom ratna si tu b'i rasti h'um phat /
T02D1736:103b-44: mig ni gsal bar 'dod pa yi //
T02D1736:103b-45: rin chen snod du 'o mas dgang //
T02D1736:103b-46: na le sham gyi rdzas kyang blugs //
T02D1736:103b-47: rten gyi mdun du bzhag byas la ;
T02D1736:103b-48: / lhar bskyed gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas //
T02D1736:103b-49: aom t'a ratsakshu sa ma ti h'um phat /
T02D1736:103b-50: srid gsum gsal ba'i shes rab 'char //
T02D1736:103b-51: lha klu gnod sbyin 'byung po dang //
T02D1736:103b-52: ro langs mkha' 'gro mi ma yin //
T02D1736:103b-54: bdud dang mu stegs pham par byed //
T02D1736:104a-2: 'dod pa'i longs spyod zla bzhin rgyas //
T02D1736:104a-3: shes rab nyi ma lta bur 'gyur //
T02D1736:104a-4: nyon mongs bag chags mkha' bzhin 'gyur //
T02D1736:104a-6: mi mthun phyogs las rnam par rgyal //
T02D1736:104a-7: gzugs dang sgra dang dri rnams dang //
T02D1736:104a-8: ro dang reg las phun sum tshogs //
T02D1736:104a-9: zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod las //
T02D1736:104a-11: nad kyi rigs su gang gtogs pa //
T02D1736:104a-12: me dang rtsi bur lta bur 'gyur //
T02D1736:104a-13: mthu stobs dbang phyug grags dang ldan //
T02D1736:104a-14: shi 'phos bla med zhing du skye //
T02D1736:104a-15: bla ma mkha' 'gro'i spyan snga ru //
T02D1736:104a-16: lo gcig zla ba gang bsgrub pa //
T02D1736:104a-17: smod du btsugs te 'bad par bya //
T02D1736:104a-18: sku gsung thugs kyi rten rnams la //
T02D1736:104a-19: rab gnas dbang ni bskur byas la //
T02D1736:104a-20: dus bzang mchod dang gtor ma dbul //
T02D1736:104a-21: me tog sngon pos mandala dbul //
T02D1736:104a-22: de ltar lha rnams lung ston 'gyur //
T02D1736:104a-23: 'bad par gyur kyang rtags med na //
T02D1736:104a-24: nyams dang sdig pa che ldan pas //
T02D1736:104a-26: sku gzugs bzhengs la bshags pa bya //
T02D1736:104a-27: lha yi spyan sngar gsol ba gdab //
T02D1736:104a-29: bdag la bri ba'i mthu med kyang //
T02D1736:104a-30: sgrol ma ral gcig gtso bcas la //
T02D1736:104a-31: mos pa'i gang zag dngos grub 'dod //
T02D1736:104a-32: de yi don du rnam par bkod //
T02D1736:104a-33: dngos grub lha yi zhal mthong shog / sgrol ma
T02D1736:104a-34: lha lnga'i sgrub thabs rin po che gsal ba zhes
T02D1736:104a-35: bya ba / slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1736:104a-37: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta ra ta na dha ti dang /
T02D1736:104a-38: bod kyi lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o//
T02D1736:104a-40: # // rgya gar gyi yul shar phyogs na /
T02D1736:104a-41: slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rje chos bshad kyin yod pa la /
T02D1736:104a-42: phag rji ma rgan mo zhig der bcud nas /
T02D1736:104a-44: res zhing ni dgod pa la /
T02D1736:104a-45: slob dpon gyis mkha' 'gro ma cig yin par shes nas /
T02D1736:104a-46: khyod res du res dngos kha ci nyes byas pas /
T02D1736:104a-47: nga dgod pa khyod phyin ci ma log par bshad pa la dga' nas dgod pa yin //
T02D1736:104a-48: du ba khyed rang gi rgyud la mang ma thebs
T02D1736:104a-49: par 'dug / slob ma la yang khyed drags phyir
T02D1736:104a-50: la nyan gyin 'dug pa la du ba yin zer
T02D1736:104a-51: / der phyag dang bskor ba byas /
T02D1736:104a-52: mandala phul nas gang las zhu byas bas //
T02D1736:104a-53: nga phag rdzi ma rgan mo cig la chos ci la yod /
T02D1736:104a-54: ngas khyod la lung bstan gyis /
T02D1736:104b-0: zangs gling phyi'i yul na rnal 'byor pa jo mo sgrol ma bsgom pa cig yod @104b kyis ;
T02D1736:104b-1: der song la gdams pa zhus shig zer nas /
T02D1736:104b-2: slob dpon gyis gser mang bar bsnams nas byon pas
T02D1736:104b-3: zangs gling gi rgyal po cig la 'di na jo
T02D1736:104b-4: mo sgrol ma bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa cig yod
T02D1736:104b-5: par 'dug pa / gang na yod dris pas /
T02D1736:104b-6: de nga'i mchod gnas yin lung pa'i phu ya gi na yod zer /
T02D1736:104b-7: der rgyal po la gser zho gcig phul nas /
T02D1736:104b-8: nga dang mjal bar zhu ba'i zhu ba 'bul dgos
T02D1736:104b-9: byas pas de byar mi 'dod khong gi nga ma
T02D1736:104b-10: shi bar du mchod gnas byas par chad /
T02D1736:104b-11: ngas khong la chos zhu ba la sogs pa ci
T02D1736:104b-12: byung yang ngo mi byed par chad pa yin zer
T02D1736:104b-13: / 'phrad pa'i thabs yod dam byas pas yod kyis /
T02D1736:104b-14: dgon par song de'i sgo na jo mo sgrol ma'i
T02D1736:104b-15: sku cig yod kyis bskor ba byed du nang par
T02D1736:104b-16: 'ong gis / bskor ba zin zin du sdod la zin pa dang /
T02D1736:104b-17: rdo gru bzhi cig gi steng du cung zhig sdod kyis /
T02D1736:104b-18: der mandala phul la zhus shig zer ro //
T02D1736:104b-19: der byon nas bsdad pas nad par byon nas mdun
T02D1736:104b-20: la bskor ba mdzad nas rdo'i steng du bzhugs pa
T02D1736:104b-21: la gser phul nas gdams pa zhus pas /
T02D1736:104b-22: gser bsnams nas slob dpon la phyi rgan rgyab nas nang du gshegs so //
T02D1736:104b-23: der zhag gsum la gsol ba 'debs kyi na bsdad pas /
T02D1736:104b-24: zhag gsum nas byon nas khyod ci 'dod gsung /
T02D1736:104b-25: bdag sangs rgyas pa'i gdams ngag zhu byas pas /
T02D1736:104b-26: jo mo sgrol ma dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i
T02D1736:104b-27: rgyud la brten nas gdams pa gnang nas bsgrubs pas
T02D1736:104b-29: des sgrub thabs las tshogs thams cad mdzad /
T02D1736:104b-30: de'i slob ma aa mo gha badzra chen po /
T02D1736:104b-31: de'i slob ma bla ma rdo rje gdan pa /
T02D1736:104b-32: des ba ri lo ts'a ba dang /
